upgrades.changelog:
- SDK with fixed dead node issue
- Added detached mode
- Added par 118
- Added OTA led signalisation
- Changed New LED scematic
- Changed Hardware Test unified version, similar to the other modules
- Fixed Associations
- Fixed Power cylce through inputs due to unauthorized memory access
- Fixed Binary switch on root reporting of all endpoints
 - Fixed manufacturer specific memory access for DSK
- Fixed Alarm Noitification response, the relays now respond based on parameters 91 - 94
- Fixed Binary Switch Report now reports at boot up
- Fixed inclusion by way of inputs
- Fixed on/off cycle at inclusion for all relays
- Removed Output indicator for succesfull inclusion/exclusion
- Removed parameters 91, 92, 93, 94
- Other minor improvements and fixes
